lucid.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: expressed in a way that is clear and easy to understand
lucid.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: You must write in a clear and lucid style.
lucid.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: able to understand and think clearly, used especially about someone who is not always able to do this
lucid.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: In her more lucid moments the old lady would talk about her past.
